attributes.action: Commission to be included for people who have been furloughed.
attributes.additional_details: For many industries, commission makes up to roughly 70%/80% of their wages such as sales. Many people in this type of job may only be on as little as £8000 salary. My self am only on 12K salary. With the furloughed system I'd get as little as £800 per month gross. Where as normally we would earn between £1500 and £4000 per month (gross)  and more even. Allow us to have our commission taken into account so that we can get a fair pay or at least a chance to pay our bills each month.
attributes.background: To allow companies to include commission as well as salary when working out what to claim for, for furloughed staff members.
